did.unittitle: African American Civil War soldier in Union uniform.

physdesc.extent: sixth plate, visible image 7.8 x 6 cm.

did.abstract: Half length portrait of a man seated with one arm resting on a table.
did.note: displayLabel="Image Package Note">Original component parts: plate. Plate: buttons and uniform slightly hand colored.;;;displayLabel="Container or Case Note">Type: no container.;;
